name: Wiedemann ATAC paired end pipeline
description: This pipeline processes paired end ATAC data.

steps.name: FastQC
steps.description: Performs an initial quality control of sequenced reads.

variables.name: Adapter sequences
variables.description: A custom list of sequencing adapters. The global data repository must contain a file called <var>adapters.txt</var> at its root.

variables.name: Kmer length
variables.description: An integer that specifies the Kmer length to be used for Kmer content detection. Must be between 2 and 10.

variables.name: SVG images
variables.description: Saves all images as vector files instead of bitmaps.
